link.description: The purpose is not to make you even more busy and to do even more in your life. Instead the purpose is to actually finish your goals. You might not like everything you read in this guide because you probably have to start stop doing certain things. Also, it isn’t the most fun to sit down and think instead of start doing – but if you don’t know exactly what your end result looks like or a plan on how to get there, how will you ever know if you’ve reached it?
